verses.verse: When Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> from a people <S%H5971><s%> of strange language <S%H3937><s%> <S%H8802><s%>;
Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> was his sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> his dominion <S%H4475><s%>.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, and fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: Yarden <S%H3383><s%> was driven <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> back <S%H268><s%>.
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> skipped <S%H7540><s%> <S%H8804><s%> like rams <S%H352><s%>, and the little hills <S%H1389><s%> like lambs <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6629><s%>.
What ailed thee, O thou sea <S%H3220><s%>, that thou fleddest <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? thou Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, that thou wast driven <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> back <S%H268><s%> ?
Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%>, that ye skipped <S%H7540><s%> <S%H8799><s%> like rams <S%H352><s%>; and ye little hills <S%H1389><s%>, like lambs <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6629><s%> ?
Tremble <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, thou earth <S%H776><s%>, at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H113><s%>, at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>;
Which turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> into a standing <S%H98><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, the flint <S%H2496><s%> into a fountain <S%H4599><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%>.
